DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety data benazepril/hydrochlorothiazide adult Chinese patient mild moderate essential hypertension . Patients whose blood pressure adequately control benazepril monotherapy 4 week run-in period randomly allocate double blind treatment 8 week either combination benazepril/hydrochlorothiazide per day continuation benazepril per day .
